title: How is this even remotly fair?

replies.body:
Uhh wtf?
Diamond 5???? Gold 1??? What mode is this??
If it's ranked teams then i'd understand, but solo???? Why?

Probs because u hav a good mmr??
Is that sarcasm or did you not see that it was normals.

oh, lol xD
well sh*t i didn't see that
Uhh then i hav no reason

-Explanation about flawed normal matchmaking not having any connection to ranked MMR.-
Yeah, its not fair and Riot needs to do something about it.
ranked doesnt matter in normals....its for having fun.

> [{quoted}](name=KingDinger,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=dL6Kj6mU,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2015-02-21T00:51:41.230+0000)
>
> ranked doesnt matter in normals....its for having fun.

I think it should matter to an extent. I agree normals is generally for fun, and I barely ever play ranked and usually just play normals. However, sometimes the matchmaking is just a bit too spread out, since there are people who play pretty much just ranked. I think it should have some degree of influence.
Just a degree, not a 1:1 influence sort of thing.
Although I enjoy being pitted against people way above my skill level sometimes, I can see why it would be frustrating for people too.

Look, even though you are versing people with much higher ranks, you probably still have a chance of beating them (otherwise you wouldn't be matched against them).

I've been put against people who were challenger and my team still won :) It's likely they're versing you because they screw around in normals and only take ranked matches seriously (because there's no way I won a serious match up against people in diamond/challenger).

Matchmaking goes off MMR, not rank. It is a normal game and people of high elo usually spend all their time in ranked and therefore have the same normal MMR and low players. 
 Like **Best Viktor Au** said, if you want fair, you should go play ranked.

Oh yeah totally fair just some casual diamond no worry
{{item:3070}}
Quit being a %%%%%, get good, and become challenger.
